episodes.synopsis: While Dylan works a pro-bono custody case, Malcolm gets off on the wrong foot and Addy receives some attention from her boss when she speaks her mind.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Beth tangles with her father in court, while Addy's clients put the firm in jeopardy. Cliff reveals something to Susan that sends Katie to Montana.
episodes.title: Where There's Smoke

episodes.synopsis: A tough INS case has Dylan at war with the law, while Beth and Addy find it difficult to represent their client in a sexual harassment case.
episodes.title: To Have and to Hold

episodes.synopsis: When a female tennis star loses her scholarship, Susan gives Beth and Dylan the difficult case, while Liam and Malcolm are pitted against each other.
episodes.title: Nothing Personal

episodes.synopsis: Dylan and Liam bond when they're the only ones who think their client is innocent. And much to Addy's surprise, her long-distance boyfriend appears.
episodes.title: An Innocent Man

episodes.synopsis: As the group struggles to close their cases, Addy and Malcolm must circumvent an insurance company, and Dylan and Beth fight for a young client.
episodes.title: White Lies, Black Ties

video.title: The Deep End
video.synopsis: Five first-year associates work at one of Los Angeles's most prestigious and ruthless law firms under two very different managing partners.
